name: Experimental High Tech Blueprint Package
desc: A collection of blueprints for several experimental high-tech hulls. The ships appear to have been undergoing heavy design revisions when this snapshot was taken, and may exhibit significant differences compared to their finalized forms, should such blueprints still exist in the Sector.

name: Signal Masker
desc:
A rare Domain black-ops device capable of masking the drive signature of a ship. It won't stand up to close scrutiny, but any cursory scan of a fleet running with transponders off will have even the most unusual masked ship show up as nothing more than a cargo freighter.

Installing this device on a unique ship will prevent it from being easily identified and exposing the rest of the fleet when transponders are off. Installation and removal is done via the drop down menu on top of the ship fitting window.
